summary: **BioShock** is a 2007 first-person shooter game where you play as Jack, who finds an underwater city called Rapture. The city, made by rich man Andrew Ryan, was meant to be perfect but went wrong when a powerful genetic material called ADAM was found. Jack tries to escape Rapture, fighting strange creatures and learning about the city's dark past. You can use guns, special powers, and Rapture's defenses to fight enemies. The game is inspired by books and people who thought about perfect societies and how they can go wrong. It's highly praised and has two sequels.
title: BioShock
